title: [CBL|K_bai]元宵节快乐！一条命令创建一个孔明灯~
author: 墨墨1zwl

replies.author: kongbaiyo
replies.txt_content:
标题: [CBL|K_bai]元宵节快乐！一条命令创建一个孔明灯~ 本帖最后由 kongbaiyo 于 2017-2-11 21:16 编辑 




各位bbs的少年们元宵节快乐！~
两天时间做了一条OOC让你能在MC里放花灯

时间紧迫弄得比较简陋 见谅 
[bili=8556204]1[/bili]

-[- 使用方法 -]-

把OOC复制到命令方块里 这里用的是1.11.2



变出个这个



并获得一个灯笼



放到地上就可以生成



向其投染料可以随机改变一块的颜色 算是花灯吧hhh




向其丢一个火把就能起飞了~在空中还会摇摆不定四处乱飘啥的



放多了还是挺壮观的~(就是比较卡)




以下是ooc原文

/summon falling_block ~ ~1.5 ~ {Time:1,Block:minecraft:redstone_block,Motion:[0d,-1d,0d],Passengers:[{id:falling_block,Time:1,Block:minecraft:activator_rail,Passengers:[{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:blockdata ~ ~-2 ~ {auto:0b,Command:""}},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:/scoreboard objectives add lanternR dummy 随机},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:/scoreboard objectives add lanternRx dummy X方向},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:/scoreboard objectives add lanternRy dummy Y方向},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:/scoreboard objectives add lanternColor dummy 颜色},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:/scoreboard objectives add lanternTime dummy 上升时间},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:/gamerule commandBlockOutput false},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"/give @a armor_stand 1 0 {EntityTag:{CustomName:\"lantern\",Tags:[\"model\",\"mark\"]},display:{Name:\"灯笼\"}}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"/summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Marker:1,Invisible:1,NoGravity:1,CustomName:\"lantern\",Tags:[\"random\"]}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"/scoreboard players add @e[tag=random] lanternR 1"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"/summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Marker:1,Invisible:1,NoGravity:1,CustomName:\"lantern\",Tags:[\"random\"]}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"/scoreboard players add @e[tag=random] lanternR 1"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"/summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Marker:1,Invisible:1,NoGravity:1,CustomName:\"lantern\",Tags:[\"random\"]}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"/scoreboard players add @e[tag=random] lanternR 1"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:fill ~1 ~-1 ~0 ~7 ~3 ~6 stained_glass 0 hollow},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:fill ~1 ~-2 ~0 ~7 ~-2 ~6 quartz_block 0 hollow},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:fill ~1 ~4 ~0 ~7 ~4 ~6 quartz_block 0 hollow},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:setblock ~4 ~3 ~1 chain_command_block 5 replace {Command:"/kill @e[tag=kill]",auto:1b}},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:setblock ~3 ~3 ~1 chain_command_block 5 replace {Command:"/execute @e[tag=fire1] ~ 250 ~ /execute @e[tag=fire1,dy=100] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players tag @e[tag=model,r=2] add kill",auto:1b}},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:setblock ~2 ~3 ~1 chain_command_block 5 replace {Command:"/execute @e[tag=fire1,score_lanternTime_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /particle flame ~ ~0.5 ~ 0.2 0.2 0.2 0.01 3 force",auto:1b}},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:setblock ~2 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 1 replace {Command:"/execute @e[tag=fire1] ~ ~ ~ /particle smoke ~ ~0.5 ~ 0.1 0.1 0.1 0.01 5 force",auto:1b}},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:setblock ~3 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players operation @e[tag=fire1,score_lanternTime_min=0,score_lanternTime=0] lanternRy = @r[type=armor_stand,tag=random] lanternR",auto:1b}},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:setblock ~4 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players operation @e[tag=fire1,score_lanternTime_min=0,score_lanternTime=0] lanternRx = @r[type=armor_stand,tag=random] lanternR",auto:1b}},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:setblock ~5 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players add @e[tag=fire1,score_lanternTime_min=0,score_lanternTime=0] 最后的最后！感谢懒癌卫士的帮助hhhh
广告链接: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-533943-1-1.html

最后有一些指令
/kill @e[tag=model]复制代码
删除所有灯笼/give @p armor_stand 1 0 {EntityTag:{CustomName:"lantern",Tags:["model","mark"]},display:{Name:"灯笼"}}复制代码
给你一个灯笼物品
